dynamic_line: She took sick a few hours after we left the lake.  Puking, complaining about her joints hurting.  I took us to some people I knew about on the riverside, hoping they might have something to help or at least know what was going on.

The area was empty, actually.  She was desperate though, so I went searching for anything I could grab.  Got my friend a grass blanket and some willow bark, but when I came out to the boat, wellâ€¦ it was too late for her.
